Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class CardDevelopment

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.CardDevelopment
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CardDevelopment
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class represents all development cards within the game. The card-specific data is store in the private enum CardDevelopmentInfo
See Also:
Serialized Form

    Modifier and Type Class Description
    private static class  CardDevelopment.CardDevelopmentInfo
    Private enum that holds the information on all CardDevelopment present in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • CardDevelopment

      public CardDevelopment​(int row, int column, int index)
      Base constructor
      Parameters:
      row - index of the market row, must be : row >= 0 && row <= 2
      column - index of the market column, must be : column >= 0 && column <= 3
      index - number of the card that has to be created within the market stack, must be : index >= 0 && index <= 3

    • canActivateProduction

      public boolean canActivateProduction​(PlayerBoard board)
      Method used to check if player has enough resources in his deposit and strongbox to activate this card
      Parameters:
      board - The PlayerBoard that owns the card.
      Returns:
      true if PlayerBoard holds enough resources, false otherwise.

    • activateProduction

      public void activateProduction​(PlayerBoard board)
      Method to consume resources from deposit and strongbox, and activate the card's production power. Consumes resources by default starting from the deposit, if not enough resources were found in deposit, the rest is taken from the strongbox. This comes from the logic by which it is always convenient to free space in the deposit rather than strongbox. This method assumes the player holds enough resources to activate the card's production power
      Parameters:
      board - The PlayerBoard that owns the card.

    • tryActivateProduction

      public boolean tryActivateProduction​(PlayerBoard board)
      Method to activate the production power of this card
      Parameters:
      board - PlayerBoard that owns the CardDevelopment and wishes to activate the production power
      Returns:
      true if activation went well, false otherwise.
